医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的智能手机应用程序使盲人用户能够在室内空间中导航两款新应用程序将使盲人能够通过智能手机应用程序的语音指示在室内建筑物中导航，从而在 GPS 不起作用的情况下提供安全的寻路方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/New-smartphone-apps-empower-blind-users-to-navigate-indoor-spaces.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/New-smartphone-apps-empower-blind-users-to-navigate-indoor-spaces.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82606944-d040-4287-a43e-01ed040633d5 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 21:15:13 -0400 New smartphone apps empower blind users to navigate indoor spaces
智能手机数据可以揭示现实世界导航过程中的早期痴呆风险研究人员发现，来自寻路任务的智能手机数据可以揭示老年人的认知衰退模式，尤其是那些主观认知衰退（SCD）的老年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Smartphone-data-can-reveal-early-dementia-risks-during-real-world-navigation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Smartphone-data-can-reveal-early-dementia-risks-during-real-world-navigation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de637c9e-a0d5-433e-a81a-cd0967961561 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 21:15:00 -0400 Smartphone data can reveal early dementia risks during real-world navigation
PANPOC 技术旨在彻底改变病毒检测PANPOC 是 PAIR 计划在这个五年项目结束时交付和实施的两项技术之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/PANPOC-technology-aims-to-revolutionize-virus-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/PANPOC-technology-aims-to-revolutionize-virus-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e01e429c-24b6-4a42-96e2-15d0241b1380 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 21:10:12 -0400 PANPOC technology aims to revolutionize virus detection
欧盟新项目旨在加强大流行病防范Covid-19 的到来就像晴天霹雳。这一流行病事件对健康、社会和经济造成了巨大影响，四年过去了，我们仍然深受其害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/New-EU-project-aims-to-enhance-pandemic-preparedness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/New-EU-project-aims-to-enhance-pandemic-preparedness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3628e7cb-6f90-413a-90ea-b14696fee258 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 21:06:18 -0400 New EU project aims to enhance pandemic preparedness
研究揭示了英国无烟尼古丁袋的营销策略白色尼古丁袋尝起来像草莓，有益健康，还能唤起一种自由感——只有瑞典人才能做到这样的自由。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-reveals-marketing-tropics-of-tobacco-free-nicotine-pouches-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-reveals-marketing-tropics-of-tobacco-free-nicotine-pouches-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a62d3879-1e85-450f-b2bb-1b48a740ea84 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 21:02:33 -0400 Study reveals marketing tactics of tobacco-free nicotine pouches in the UK
人工智能可在乳房 X 光检查诊断前数年检测出乳腺癌最近的研究表明，人工智能乳房 X 光检查评分可以在临床诊断前六年预测乳腺癌，为早期干预提供了机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/AI-detects-breast-cancer-years-before-diagnosis-from-mammograms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/AI-detects-breast-cancer-years-before-diagnosis-from-mammograms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c01e8217-1320-4daa-b5e0-d26636116df5 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 21:02:00 -0400 AI detects breast cancer years before diagnosis from mammograms
热应激会影响婴儿早期关键时期的发育一项新的分析表明，暴露在高温下可能会影响怀孕期间胎儿和两岁以下婴儿的生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Heat-stress-impacts-development-of-babies-during-ritic-early-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Heat-stress-impacts-development-of-babies-during-ritic-early-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a518898f-ee62-4111-a684-fdf9126f333e Tue, 08 Oct 2024 20:37:00 -0400 Heat stress impacts development of babies during critical early years
全球分析显示获得新抗癌药物的机会存在差异尽管在新抗癌药物的发现和开发方面取得了相当大的进展，但全球范围内这些药物的可用性和及时性仍存在显着差异，较贫穷的国家错过了这一结果，发表在《2019 年》杂志上的一项对 1990 年至 2022 年新药上市的全球分析表明开放获取期刊 BMJ Global Health。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Global-analysis-reveals-disparities-in-access-to-new-cancer-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Global-analysis-reveals-disparities-in-access-to-new-cancer-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=088166b8-73d9-4817-aaae-827722747be3 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 20:30:28 -0400 Global analysis reveals disparities in access to new cancer drugs
研究显示，紧急护理等待时间较长会影响髋部骨折患者的结果《急诊医学杂志》在线发表的一项单中心研究显示，在紧急护理中等待治疗超过 4 小时与髋部骨折患者的死亡风险增加和住院时间延长有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Longer-waits-in-emergency-care-impact-outcomes-for-hip-fracture-病人-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Longer-waits-in-emergency-care-impact-outcomes-for-hip-fracture-病人-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e84d7fdd-63ae-4dcd-90c4-8b5d3cf5d62b Tue, 08 Oct 2024 20:28:18 -0400 Longer waits in emergency care impact outcomes for hip fracture patients, study shows
检测人参补充剂掺假的突破查普曼大学食品科学项目副教授 Rosalee Hellberg 和她的研究团队在打击膳食补充剂掺假方面取得了重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Breakthrough-in-detecting-adulteration-in-ginseng-supplements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Breakthrough-in-detecting-adulteration-in-ginseng-supplements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc7cd1cc-b06e-4bfa-ac7a-bab0b933a86f Tue, 08 Oct 2024 20:23:44 -0400 Breakthrough in detecting adulteration in ginseng supplements
